eddy.lang.analysis

Class LimitationPrinciple

  • java.lang.Object
    • eddy.lang.analysis.LimitationPrinciple
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompilationProperties

    public class LimitationPrinciple
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompilationProperties
    Applies the limitation principle across two actions. This implementation identifies all source rights (e.g., collection rights) and generates rights for the target actions with the same role descriptions. Satisfiability is checked by assuring that all original target rights are subsumed by the new target rights generated by this principle. Subsumption is checked by ensuring the set of original target interpretations is contained in the set of new target interpretations. The new target rights generated by this principle are not preserved within the original policy and are discarded after this analysis completes.
    Author:
    Travis Breaux
